descriptionHtml:
My first mod??
seriously what am I doing.

Ok um, Marrok is an oc character from a story of mine, and well they'd all fit well into the skyrim world.
I've never thought about adding my followers to this site; but with a lack of male followers (and some ridiculous looking ones) I've decided to contribute (in my own horrible way)
seriously, I don't know what i'm doing half the time.

Marrok is suppose to be the prince of demons  (to which he was a failure) but here in skyrim he's just some guy [b]at Jorrvaskr.
[/b](lets be honest, no ones here for his story. I was thinking about making a quest line for him but like I said before, I don't know what i'm doing half the time.)
[i]Stats and stuff:[/i]
-Archery
-Marriageable
-Nord
-Level 20 min , (can make it higher if people want;[s] though I doubt anyone even wants to download[/s])

If you can't find him just do;  Player.placeatme 03000dD63

[b][u]requires Apachii hair males mod and newest skyrim update[/u][/b]
<
author: Redwolf
